product_name: Emotion Kayaks Spitfire 12 T Tandem Sit-On-Top Kayak
long_description: Outfitted with comfortable features, the Emotion Kayaks Spitfire 12T Tandem Sit-On-Top Kayak offers fun on the water for you and a partner at a great value. 12 ft. length offers easy-cruising speed and maintains confidence-inspiring stability; slight rocker adds maneuverability and defined keel aids in tracking. Specially compounded polyethylene hull resists abrasion and UV light, and specialized blowmolding process produces a strong hull of consistent quality. Seat backs increase support and fold down when storing the boat, and molded-in footwells offer supportive bracing for paddlers of different heights. Aft storage tank well with bungee rigging and cargo netting secures your gear; cargo netting works well with bulky items such as an extra paddling jacket or PFD. Small bow storage area secures accessories with bungees; scupper holes drain water from cockpit to ensure a dry ride. Multiple carry handles and built-in skeg wheel makes transport to the water easy.
short_description: Outfitted with comfortable features, the Emotion Kayaks Spitfire 12T Tandem Sit-On-Top Kayak offers fun on the water for you and a partner at a great value.
